pkgmetadata.longdescription: A Flexible Interface for 'LLM' API Interactions // Provides a flexible interface for interacting with Large Language Model ('LLM') providers such as 'OpenAI' (https://openai.com/), 'Groq' (https://groq.com/), and 'Anthropic' (https://www.anthropic.com/). Supports both synchronous and asynchronous API calls with features such as retry logic, support for additional parameters, and multi-message handling to streamline integration with state-of-the-art 'LLM' APIs.
